sentence: The staff member explained it is their busiest week etc etc SO PUT MORE STAFF ON
Next night tried again for room service this time at 6 pm no luck this time the wait was 90 minutes
Room service a shocker waiting time consistently 2 hours
We then sat down and he informed us of our room rate including a 250 per night fee for the concierge lounge

When I told him I was not interested in paying for concierge service he literally got up and started walking out of the room saying well I will not kick your family out but we can not stay in the concierge
I am really disappointed in the customer service this morning
That was probably just unlucky however the service we received when we tried to move was not up to scratch and the room we subsequently moved to had a strange dripping noise coming from the pipes
There was consistently a long wait every time we picked up the phone for the front desk the bell hop the valet etc
I think if you understand that you will be met with indifference by the Disney staff you will have an OK albeit expensive experience
The WiFi is EXTREMELY slow and at one point during the trip it was out of service the entire night
When I ran downstairs Brittany and two security guards had the gate pulled back and she escorted me in
The dining at Storytellers Cafe offered various food accommodations and had just as kind employees as every other part of the hotel
I am wondering if there is new management because service was horrible
The front desk truly on autopilot with responses
very clean and luxury but not happy with front desk service
We had a terrible experience here and the staff did nothing to help
After going to the help desk at disneyland they replaced his ticket no problem
You are paying for being in the park the convenience and the service
Service and room were great my only complaint was the condition of the vending and ice machines which only seemed to work on certain floors not mine

The staff were helpful however we could not get our room until 430pm on check in day we needed to go out at 530 to a hockey match so ended up rushing and hanging about waiting for the room after a long journey we arrived at 130 perhaps naively expecting a room as at other cheaper places on our vacation this had not been an issue
I made the hotel and ticket reservations overseas and told the agent on the phone to keep the tickets at the desk of the hotel as I knew I was not going to visit my sister in San Diego before we went
Where is customer service at this place
The hotel is HUGE and they clearly do not have the staff to provide proper guest attention
As at all Disney entities they referred to the staff as cast members
24 hour room service
we have dined there before and the food and service has always been superior
Hotel OK concierge appalling
Wonderful staff but noisy construction and broken elevators ruin the Disney magic
Watch out for the dusting crew bell hop service
We came into the hotel entrance and a bellman gave us a ticket and said not to worry the luggage would be delivered to the room
33 once delivery fees and tip went on there
As much as people are being charged for rooms food drinks and room service there should n’t be problems like this with getting food
Our experience Check in slow but delightful service where got to counter
I go back to front desk and demand to call the manager to come out and resolve this situation
He took me out of the line and took me to the next open front desk person who took the postcard and said that the hotel will cover the postage
The operation of the bell desk valet in front of the hotel is an absolute joke
More unpleasant staff here than any other property
You could have valet service which would bring to 35 a day
At around 8 AM I proceeded down to the desk and told them about what had happened and showed the pictures of the device that injured me
Expensive but service and accommodations were excellent
